com.revo.deployr.client.broker.options

Class PoolCreationOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revo.deployr.client.broker.options.PoolCreationOptions

  • public class PoolCreationOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Startup options for a Pooled Task RBroker.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String preloadByDirectory
      Preload by directory option allows the loading of all files from one or more repository-managed directories into the working directory into the working directory of each R session in the pool on pool initialization.
      PoolPreloadOptions preloadDirectory
      Preload working directory options allow the loading of one or more files from the repository into the working directory of each R session in the pool on pool initialization.
      PoolPreloadOptions preloadWorkspace
      Preload workspace options allow the loading of one or more binary R objects from the repository into the workspace of each R session in the pool on pool initialization.
      boolean releaseGridResources
      ReleaseGridResources when enabled causes all live grid resources held by the user to be released before the new pool is created.
      java.util.List<com.revo.deployr.client.data.RData> rinputs
      Rinputs allow the loading of one or more DeployR-encoded R objects to be added to the workspace of each R session in the pool on pool initialization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PoolCreationOptions() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • preloadDirectory

        public PoolPreloadOptions preloadDirectory
        Preload working directory options allow the loading of one or more files from the repository into the working directory of each R session in the pool on pool initialization.

      • preloadWorkspace

        public PoolPreloadOptions preloadWorkspace
        Preload workspace options allow the loading of one or more binary R objects from the repository into the workspace of each R session in the pool on pool initialization.

      • preloadByDirectory

        public java.lang.String preloadByDirectory
        Preload by directory option allows the loading of all files from one or more repository-managed directories into the working directory into the working directory of each R session in the pool on pool initialization.

        When loading the contents of more than one directory, use a comma-separated list of directory names.

      • rinputs

        public java.util.List<com.revo.deployr.client.data.RData> rinputs
        Rinputs allow the loading of one or more DeployR-encoded R objects to be added to the workspace of each R session in the pool on pool initialization.

      • releaseGridResources

        public boolean releaseGridResources
        ReleaseGridResources when enabled causes all live grid resources held by the user to be released before the new pool is created.

        This is particularly useful if your client application needs to create a new pool having lost its connection to an original pool. For example, due to a network connection failure between your client application and the DeployR server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PoolCreationOptions

        public PoolCreationOptions()
